narrative:
This focused inspection and exit interview was conducted by the facility representatives and Sandra Meek, ACI.
This focused inspection was conducted to insure the previously identified animals had been evaluated / treated by
the attending veterinarian.
This is an electronic version of the inspection conducted on July 29, 2015.  This inspection report also corrects the
same report dated July 30, 2015.
